text: Pekwachnamaykoskwaskwaypinwanik Lake is a fresh water lake in Manitoba, Canada.Geonames It is Cree for "where the wild trout are caught by fishing with hooks." It is the longest place name in Canada. It is located near Red Sucker Lake in northeastern Manitoba. ==References== Category:Lakes of Canada Category:Geography of Manitoba
title: Pekwachnamaykoskwaskwaypinwanik Lake
